def factoria1(n)
   ifn<1
      raise "argument must be > 0"
   else
      n * factoria1(n - 1)
   end
end
puts factoria1(1)
puts factoria1(5)
nuts factorial 0
def factorial(n)
   raise "argument must be > 0" if n < 1
   return 1 1f n== 1
   n * factorial(n-1)
end
puts factoria1(1)
puts factoria1(5)
puts factoria1(0)
